```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(gt)
```



Usando los datos de COVID-19

```{r}
library(data.table)
mydat<- read.csv('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/owid/covid-19-data/master/public/data/owid-covid-data.csv')

gt(head(mydat, n=10))
```

# Seleccionar variables y filtrar para Puerto Rico solamente


```{r}
dfPR=mydat%>%
  select(location, new_cases, total_deaths)%>%
  filter(location=="Puerto Rico")
```


```{r}
dfPR%>%
  ggplot(aes(total_deaths))+
  geom_dotplot()+
  scale_y_continuous(NULL, breaks = NULL)
```
